selected_skills.name: extract_highest_volume_marking
selected_skills.purpose: To identify and read the marked measure of angle H from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to process the image data and extract the numeric value marked for angle H.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the selected multiple-choice option as the final answer.

new_skill_specs.name: map_measure_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To map the extracted measure of angle H to the correct multiple-choice option.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the correct multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: If the measure does not match any option, return an error or a default value.
